sentences.sentence: Sometimes, you will be allowed to choose your own appraiser.
sentences.translation: 有时，你将被允许选择自己的鉴定。

sentences.sentence: I wanted to schedule a time for our appraiser to come out to your loft.
sentences.translation: 我想跟您约个时间，我们的估价师会到您的住所去。

sentences.sentence: Judicial expertise institution and judicial appraiser should be neutral.
sentences.translation: 司法鉴定机构和司法鉴定人应该中立。
